title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: To earn the first point, it must be possible to use the written equations to arrive at a correct final equation.
descriptions: Student response does not accurately include the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes two of the following criteria.

title: Part (b)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: Student response does not accurately include the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes two of the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes four of the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes four of the following criteria.

title: Part (c)ii
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: Student response does not accurately include the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes both of the following criteria.

title: Part (c)iii
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: if students graph y versus x which results in a parabola, it is not sufficient for a student to simply note that a graph of y versus x is curved, or that the graph “looks like a parabola”.) Students must say that y increases by a factor of approximately 4 whenever x is doubled, or similar.
descriptions: Student response does not accurately include the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes the following criteria.

title: Part (d)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: Student response does not accurately include the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
Student response accurately includes both of the following criteria.
